room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game Houston in Houston
review: Definitely a must try! Gets you to work together and in sync with your team! Great for any team building activity!

room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game Houston in Houston
review: All team members were engaged, had fun and learn one or two new things about each other. Our guide was enthusiastic and kept the moral up. I have also been here with friends and young kids and everyone utterly enjoyed. Iâ€™d recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game Houston in Houston
review: I am always hesitant about the whole office team building escapades> who isnt? When they chose this location(City Center) and the idea of the difficulty level 9-10 I was in. The staff was awesome and the location was great. The attention to detail and the interactions made the whole experience so much fun. I cant wait till our next Team Building adventure Special OPs

room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game Houston in Houston
review: Had a blast. Took my team here for a corporate team building event. It was great. The people here are professional and customer service goes above and beyond.

room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game Houston in Houston
review: The Escape Game Houston is the best escape room experience I've ever had. The staff are fun and friendly and the rooms are constructed masterfully. I would highly recommend this for groups of friends and family! Tim who led our room was a great guy, always helpful and had great tips when we got stuck. 10/10 would recommend
